botMessages.message:
Hi!
I'm the Catalyst Lab's AI assistant, here to help capture the details of your idea.
I'm going to ask you a series of questions that will help the Catalyst Lab quickly and effectively respond to your idea.
This shouldn't take more than 5-10 minutes.
You may not know some of the answers, but please answer to the best of your ability.
I can also check on the status of any previously submitted Ideas - just ask!
Sorry, it looks like something has gone wrong.

botDialogs.label: Unfortunately, a system error occurred. Let us start again.

botMessages.message: One moment while I connect you to the next available service representative.

conversationVariables.description: Stores the authentication key that's used to generate the verification code.
conversationVariables.label: authenticationKey

conversationVariables.description: Stores the Salesforce user ID or contact ID.
conversationVariables.label: customerId

conversationVariables.description: Stores the customer ID type, whether it's a Salesforce user or a contact.
conversationVariables.label: customerType

conversationVariables.description: Stores a boolean value that indicates whether the customer code is verified.
conversationVariables.label: isVerified

conversationVariables.description: These are the benefits of the User's idea (persisted).

conversationVariables.description: This is the budget of the User's idea (persisted).

conversationVariables.label: persistedBusiness_Sector

conversationVariables.label: persistedCore_Features

conversationVariables.description: These are the primary outcomes of the User's idea (persisted).
conversationVariables.label: persistedPrimary_Outcome

conversationVariables.description: This is the revenue impact of the User's idea (persisted).
conversationVariables.label: persistedRevenue_Impact

conversationVariables.description: This is a summary of the User's idea (persisted).

conversationVariables.label: persistedTarget_Audience

conversationVariables.description: This is the technology, tool or plaform preference of the User's idea (persisted).

conversationVariables.description: This is the target audience external account of the User's idea.
conversationVariables.label: Target_Audience_Account_Name

conversationVariables.description: This variable may also be referred to as VerifiedCustomerId
conversationVariables.label: VerifiedCustomerId

BotVersion.role: Your job is to ask relevant questions of the User around the idea that they have and provide a summary before saving the details of the Idea.
